channel.title: Client closes after 2-3 clicks
channel.description:
I'm just getting back into mopar so i'm practically new at this again... I'm running a 317 server on a 64-bit computer, and i tried converting the .bat file too .exe still didn't work. here's my error.
[img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/6058/compiler.png[/img]
Heres my compiler code...
[code]@echo off title Client cd ./locandclass/ "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_22/bin/java" -Xmx512m client 10
0 highmem members 64 pause[/code]
If you could help me out that'd be great, i'd like too start running servers again. :o

item.title: Client closes after 2-3 clicks
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Ahh, thank you, it works fine now

Read full topic

item.title: Client closes after 2-3 clicks
item.dc:creator: @xknightpk xknightpk
item.description:
@xknightpk wrote:

Try re-uninstalling jdk or java, or put your java location in the run batch file.

Read full topic

item.title: Client closes after 2-3 clicks
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

…If i were you i’d just use a different client.
I’ve never seen an error like that before.

Read full topic
